channel.title: Run.bat and Compiler issues
channel.description:
I currently have JDK1.7.0_05 and JRE7. run.bat code: [code] @ECHO OFF echo client echo. :run javaw -cp . -Xmx150m EGUI pause[/code] run.bat problems: [code] 'javaw' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file. press any key to continue...[/code] compiler code: [code] @echo off @TITLE Compile javac *.java :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code] compiler problems: [code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file. You do not have Java installed. Please downlaod it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Press any key to continue...[/code]
I currently have JDK1.7.0_05 and JRE7 downloaded in: c:/programfiles(x86)/java
I would appreciate some help! thank you!

item.title: Run.bat and Compiler issues
item.dc:creator: @crusherscape crusherscape
item.description:
@crusherscape wrote:

I currently have JDK1.7.0_05 and JRE7.
run.bat code: @ECHO OFF echo client echo. :run javaw -cp . -Xmx150m EGUI pause
run.bat problems:

'javaw' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file. press any key to continue...
compiler code: @echo off @TITLE Compile javac *.java :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit
compiler problems:

'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file. You do not have Java installed. Please downlaod it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Press any key to continue...

I currently have JDK1.7.0_05 and JRE7 downloaded in: c:/programfiles(x86)/java

I would appreciate some help! thank you!
